scripts._comment1: remove dist directory every time this command is run: rm -rf dist && webpack-dev-server --config webpack.dev.js --open
scripts._comment2: no hot reloading without dev-server: build-dev: webpack --config webpack.dev.js --watch --info-verbosity verbose
scripts._comment3: build-dev is using CleanWebpackPlugin setup as a plugin in webpack.dev.js
scripts._comment4: plug-in new BundleAnalyzerPlugin() opens a separate browser tab and shows the usage analysis of the different packages in the app
